Name: Add Product to Cart from Amazon Product Page
Description: Navigate to a specific product page on Amazon and add the item to the cart, then verify the cart page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to */dp/*/ref=lp 10894230031 1 1 with params (pf rd p, pf rd r, sbo, th)
Step 2: Click on input AddToCart -> Navigate to page 'ecommerce#cart/smart-wagon'
Step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Add Another Product to Cart from Amazon Product Page
Description: Navigate to a specific product page on Amazon and add the item to the cart, then verify the cart page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to */dp/*/ref=sr 1 6 with params (dib, dib tag, pf rd i, pf rd m, pf rd s, qid, refinements, rnid, rps, s, sr)
Step 2: Click on input AddToCart2 -> Navigate to page 'ecommerce#cart/smart-wagon'
Step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Browse Amazon Prime Video and Electronics Categories

Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link AllCategoriesMenu
Step 3: Click on link productCategories (FireTV)
Step 4: Click on link AmazonPrimeVideo -> Navigate to page 'single character path#*'

Step 8: Click on link Laptops -> Navigate to page 'ecommerce#*/ref=cepc sbc atfbau 1'

Step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
